episodes.description: Added user profile picture upload feature
Researched GraphQL vs REST API design patterns
episodes.details: Chose REST for simplicity, GraphQL for complex queries

episodes.description: Fixed memory leak in database connection pool
episodes.details: Changed connection pooling to use bounded queue

episodes.description: Implemented authentication system with JWT tokens
Claude Code /model picker cannot be modified - it's hardcoded in minified CLI
episodes.details: Tried multiple patch approaches. The RU3() function is minified and hardcoded. claudish doesn't modify picker, uses --model flag instead. Recommend using separate /model commands or --model flag rather than modifying picker.

episodes.description: Clauded model picker now shows all 15 models from proxy
episodes.details: Root cause: curl subprocess timeout. Solution: Node http module with busy-wait. Verified working: 15/15 models load at CLI startup.
